title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very professional, and easy.  People who interviewed were easy to get a long with and seemed very genuine.  Questions were straightforward and to the point.  And they even through in some fun questions to gauge your personality.
Interview Questions: What are your personal and professional strengths?

title: Administrative Specialist III Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Ozark, AR) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: The  questions were entry level. Basic, introduce yourself, is there anything you would like to tell us thats not on your resume. How would you describe yourself and your work history.. etc
Interview Questions: Is there anything that you want to tell us that isnt on your resume?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: It depends on your professor, the questions are easy and based on your daily life. Be professional and response with other students.  And based on your major and department you will be working at.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a student worker?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Comfortable. The interview was 1 on 1. They asked a series of general questions, then allowed me to tour the facility. We ended up meeting the faculty heads of each department.
Interview Questions: What can you add to help our overall goals?

title: Work-study In Musuem Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very Brief and straight forward. Ask about personal habits and some of my experiences in working with drills and stage planning. introduced me to the entire place and showed me the Ins and Outs and also showed me where id be spending most of my time. Ask for references and called everyone of them and also tested my social ability to communicate with visitors to the musuem
Interview Questions: how punctual are you with all your classes to your work?

title: Resident Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Russellville, AR) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: They had several interview stations set up and you interviewed separately with multiple RDs on campus and then the next session you had a group interview to see how well you worked with others.

title: Administrative Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Russellville, AR) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Met with the Department Head of the academic department in which I worked and discussed my credentials for approximately 10 to 15 minutes.  One thing to note is that the interviewer stated that he was generally distrustful of others.  In hindsight, I realize that was a red flag.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself.  Why do you want to work here?  How are you qualified?, etc.

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Russellville, AR) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was easy, questions about myself, my background, my language skills, my time management skills, what i have done before, what makes me unique for this position. They told me what my duties would be and how it would be going for 12 weeks.
Interview Questions: What makes you different from other interns

title: Network Support Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Russellville, AR) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was fine. Online ad that you'd then submit your information too. It took a few weeks to hear back but when I did the interview and hiring process was immediate. Good questions asked and friendly people.

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: Maintain the academic excellence, then apply.
Interview Questions: What can you do for the department

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Russellville, AR) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: The first question was about what the experience I had in planning for evacuation in my previous job. The second question about how my previous company help refugees and what is my task in the operation. Finally how my MBA certificate will support the new master degree of Emergency management and homeland security.

title: Isa Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Arkansas Tech (Russellville, AR) in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: Fairly easy. It was one on one with the supervisor for 30 minutes. She spent 15 minutes talking about the benefit package and the work conditions. She spent the remanding time asking me why I wanted the job and what my goals where in life.
Interview Questions: Did I realize the pay was low?
